chargeHist.descr: Take and Drive Vehicle w/o Consent

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
10:28 AM Defendant Jermell Hajwan Sledge in court.  Attorney Refugio Cuco Longoria in court for Jermell Hajwan Sledge.  Prosecuting attorney David S Olson and intern Verity Altenberger in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case 22CM606 is to follow this case.
Final pre-trial scheduled for December 1, 2022 at 08:45 am.
Jury selection scheduled for December 12, 2022 at 08:00 am.
Jury trial scheduled for December 12, 2022 at 08:00 am.
Calendar call on October 20, 2022 at 10:00 am.

03:32 PM Defendant Jermell Hajwan Sledge appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Colin Nicholson appearing by video on behalf of attorney Cuco Longoria not in court.   Prosecuting attorney David Zarwell appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived. Not guilty plea entered. Remand to branch 6 for scheduling.

3:00 PM Defendant Jermell Hajwan Sledge appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Refugio Cuco Longoria appeared by video for Jermell Hajwan Sledge.  Prosecuting attorney Alexander David Goulart appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives preliminary hearing freely and voluntarily.  Court accepts waiver and binds the Defendant over for the filing of an Information. Arraignment set for October 5, 2022 at 3:00 pm
Notice of Hearing for Adjourned Initial Appearance on September 28, 2022 at 1:00pm, MOVED LEFT NO ADDRESS, UNABLE TO FORWARD, RETURN TO SENDER (Defendant Jermell Hajwan Sledge)
Adjourned initial appearance on September 28, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
